comments.author: Dave
comments.body: I'm wheel-less until next Wednesday. I'm running Crown Rock today. Telecom at 12:10

comments.author: Rob
comments.body: See you runners at Telecom at 12:10. I'll ride with y'all tomorrow :)

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: The Frenzy has never been so balkanized. RL and DU, rogues both, ran Crown Rock. Burton's imaginary friend (the one with the "titanium" bike) evaporated mysteriously, leaving MB blessedly speechless. Pokey1, finally lured out from under his desk with a slab of raw steak and a chilled ESB, jumped on his bike and headed up Flag w/ the aforementioned MB. Bailey was Gone Johnson, pure and simple; if he actually ended up boxing anything it was doubtless the pastry bin at Baby Doe's. And Kevin? Pick a meeting... In short, this outfit has become dysfunctional to the core, and appears to be gripped in an entropic tailspin. And I thought seeing Britney crack up was painful...

comments.author: Rob
comments.body: Not to worry, Steve. I'll ride with you today. It's gonna be OK. Speaking of donuts, want to ride to Louisville and go to LaMar's? (Aka Media Monkey!)
